bike.description: Full high modulus carbon fiber, Dyad Ultra lay-up, tri-oval shaped top and down tubes with SST tubing diameters, 1 1/8-1 1/2" head tube, PressFit 30 BB shell, asymmetrical chainstays, twin seat stays, forged one-piece dropouts with replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Jamis Xenith Comp level, full carbon composite, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, carbon dropouts with stainless axle interfaces
Mavic Aksium Race wheelset, 20H, 24mm rim profile with UC Control and H2 technology, Mavic alloy hubs with QRM bearings and FTS-L freehub and straight pull aerodynamic stainless spokes
Vittoria Zaffiro Pro Slick, 700 x 23c, folding
Shimano Ultegra RD-6700 rear and Ultegra FD-6700 braze-on front with 34.9mm alloy clamp
Shimano Ultegra ST- 6700 Dual Control STI, 20-Speed
Ritchey Comp Logic II, 6061 double-butted aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm (48/51), 420mm (54/56), 440mm (58/61)
Ritchey Comp 4-Axis, 3D net forged 6061 alloy, 6JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (48/51), 100mm (54/56), 120mm (58/61)
Jamis carbon fiber micro-adjust, 31.6 x 300mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco Ponza Power Arrowhead with Microfeel and shine cover and hollow cro-mo rails
